app_mention:
HEY THERE, BUDDY! ğŸ¦€ I'm your favorite kudos coach! ğŸŒŠ

Here's how to make some waves:
â€¢ `/kk @user message` - Send love to one person
â€¢ `/kk @user1 @user2 message` - Spread the love to multiple people
â€¢ `/kk leaderboard` - See who's making the biggest splash
â€¢ `/kk leaderboard Aug 2025` - See specific month/year
â€¢ `/kk stats` - Check your own kudos journey

Let's make this ocean sparkle, bud! âœ¨
